item.title: How to search the Michigan legislature for pending legislation
item.description: I'm trying my best to track every bill that affects Freedom of Information Act laws in Michigan. The method runs as follows: 1. Go to the Michigan Legislative Website, where bills and their status are shown. 2. Search bill text for "Freedom of information". 3. Note with (dismay? amazement?) that 14 bills are found, 4 on the Senate side, 10 on the House side. Realize that this includes legislation that refers to FOIA laws but does not change them.
